      protected void onSizeChanged(int w, int h, int oldw, int oldh)
      Use onSizeChanged instead of onAttachedToWindow to get the dimensions of the view, because this method is called after measuring the dimensions of MATCH_PARENT & WRAP_CONTENT.
      protected void onVisibilityChanged(android.view.View changedView, int visibility) 
      void resetCount()
      Reset the count (in increment mode)

      Sets the color of the spinning bar

      Sets the width of the spinning bar

      void setCircleRadius(int circleRadius)
      Sets the radius of the wheel
      void setInstantProgress(float progress)
      Set the progress to a specific value, the bar will be set instantly to that value
      void setLinearProgress(boolean isLinear)
      Sets the determinate progress mode
      void setProgress(float progress)
      Set the progress to a specific value, the bar will smoothly animate until that value
      void setRimColor(int rimColor)
      Sets the color of the wheel's contour
      void setRimWidth(int rimWidth)
      Sets the width of the wheel's contour
      void setSpinSpeed(float spinSpeed)
      Sets the base spinning speed, in full circle turns per second (1.0 equals on full turn in one second), this value also is applied for the smoothness when setting a progress
      void spin()
      Puts the view on spin mode
      void stopSpinning()
      Turn off spin mode

      • onSizeChanged

        protected void onSizeChanged(int w,
                             int h,
                             int oldw,
                             int oldh)
        Use onSizeChanged instead of onAttachedToWindow to get the dimensions of the view, because this method is called after measuring the dimensions of MATCH_PARENT & WRAP_CONTENT. Use this dimensions to setup the bounds and paints.
        覆盖:
        onSizeChanged 在类中 android.view.View

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
        返回:
        the current progress between 0.0 and 1.0, if the wheel is indeterminate, then the result is -1

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(float progress)
        Set the progress to a specific value, the bar will smoothly animate until that value
        参数:
        progress - the progress between 0 and 1

      • setLinearProgress

        public void setLinearProgress(boolean isLinear)
        Sets the determinate progress mode
        参数:
        isLinear - if the progress should increase linearly

        public float getSpinSpeed()
        返回:
        the base spinning speed, in full circle turns per second (1.0 equals on full turn in one second), this value also is applied for the smoothness when setting a progress

      • setSpinSpeed

        public void setSpinSpeed(float spinSpeed)
        Sets the base spinning speed, in full circle turns per second (1.0 equals on full turn in one second), this value also is applied for the smoothness when setting a progress
        参数:
        spinSpeed - the desired base speed in full turns per second
